data.text: @PSUBarstool So the insipid 'Wear your masks for safety' announcements every 20 minutes at the BJC will cease?! Thank god. And hoping the ushers will shred the mask reminder signs also.

@PSUBarstool One thing I will say:. watched Micah Shrewsbury post game press conference last night.  He took full responsibility, even said "I sucked"!  That's what James Franklin should have said after the Illinois loss, but he didn't.
@PSUBarstool Micah Shrewsbury, and the entire basketball team, should wear masks over their entire faces after that pathetic performance yesterday.
@PSUBarstool Well what a good idea. I wish I had thought of that.
@PSUBarstool Its 2022 and we’re still making people wear masks…COVID isn’t even talked about anymore. Mostly everyone has either gotten COVID or the VAX. Time to put this behind us

@PSUBarstool Can someone explain how we are in “high” transmission if our campus positivity rate is 0.9% and there are only 14 people hospitalized with covid? Are the farmer & Amish #s really that high that the campus is punished for it? 🤔🤔🤔
@PSUBarstool The old bag ushers will be devastated
@PSUBarstool You guys are 3 days late on this lmao
